meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by my history course and uncertain about my future in academia
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Sharon, a first-year History major. I’ve taken a few history courses and really enjoyed them, but I’m also in a major with a lot of math and science courses, and I’m still feeling like I don’t quite fit in with the academic culture here. I’m not sure if I should be in this major, and I’m worried that I’m not measuring up academically. I’m also really interested in writing and history, but I don’t know how to connect what I’m learning to something meaningful or how to do research. I’m attending a private university with a very strong academic culture, and I’m feeling like everyone else is already ahead of me, but I don’t know if I belong here.
